meaning_str.bing:
n. 新娘
网络. 新妇；新嫁娘；新娘课堂

新娘；准新娘；即将结婚的女子；刚刚结婚的女子

1.en: The young bride was silent. Her in-laws did not know that she was already using birth-control pills.
1.cn: 年轻的新娘沉默了。公公婆婆并不知道自己的媳妇已经在使用避孕药了。

2.en: Because we did not know the young man or his bride, we decided to send them a practical household gift, a fire extinguisher.
2.cn: 由于我们都不认识那个年轻人和他的新娘，所以我们决定送给他们一个实用的过日子的礼物一个灭火器。

3.en: Ai Fusha good anti-wrinkle composition, the general effect of 3 days to see a month down the enemy to protect you happy to do the bride.
3.cn: 艾弗莎抗皱组合不错，一般3天能看出效果，一个月下去保你的冤家快快乐乐做新娘。

0.en: Here comes the bride. Oh my God, Monica.
0.cn: 新娘来了。我的天，莫妮卡。

1.en: I don't have pink eye. Hey! Hey. Hey. Step away from the bride.
1.cn: 我又没得红眼病。慢着。慢着。慢着。别靠近新娘。

2.en: No, no. Rachel, don't get it. He'll see us. No, yeah. The groom cannot see the bride.
2.cn: 瑞秋，别开门，他会看见。新郞不能看见新娘。

3.en: At said ball, in accordance with ancient custom, the prince shall choose a bride.
3.cn: 在这场舞会上根据传统风俗，王子将会选择他的新娘。

4.en: Howie? Hey, there's my beautiful bride! Can you see me? I can. How are you?
4.cn: 华仔。我美丽的新娘子，你可以看见我吗？可以，你还好吗？

5.en: I know, right? And, thanks to photographs and some little 3-D modeling, here comes the bride.
5.cn: 是吧，是吧，多亏有照片，还有3D塑造工艺，新娘驾到咯。

6.en: Ooh-la. Cinderella at the ball! No one wants a servant for a bride. After all I've done…
6.cn: 哎呦。灰姑娘要去舞会了，没人想娶一个仆人当新娘的。我都那么做了，你还是……

7.en: Oh absolutely. It has been in my family for generations, and every bride who has worn it has had a long and happy life.
7.cn: 当然，它是我家的传家宝，每个戴上它的新娘，都能幸福到老。

8.en: And they didn't even cut me in on the Lifetime Movie rights. It's on in January, Father Is the Bride.
8.cn: 把故事版权卖给生活电影台时，钱也没分我，一月份就上映了，片名是《新娘是岳父》。

9.en: "The Business Bride." Wasn't that Katherine Heigl's last movie? The one that brought her back to TV?
9.cn: "商界新娘"呀，这不是凯瑟琳·海格尔上一部电影的情节吗？就是把她踢回电视圈的那部烂片？

10.en: Hey, hey, since you're the 'fix-it' lady, here's a pickle, what do you do when the bride says she doesn't want to have the wedding at all?
10.cn: 既然你这么会解决问题，问题来了，当新娘说她不想结婚时，你怎么办？

11.en: And, this marriage is doubly special for me, because not only is the groom my best friend, but the bride is my little sister.
11.cn: 这段婚姻对我来说有双重意义，不只因为新郎是我的好朋友，更因为新娘是我的妹妹。

12.en: Trust me, you don't want him there either. Okay? Nobody is gonna be staring at the bride when the father of the groom is wearing a back-less dress.
12.cn: 你不会想邀请他来的，当新郎的爸爸穿着露背装的时候，没有人会看新娘。

13.en: You may not kiss the bride. So, I guess by the powers vested in my by the state of New York and the Internet guys, I now pronounce you husband and wife.
13.cn: 你可以吻新娘了，我要以纽约州跟网友们赋予我的权力，我现在宣布你们结为夫妇。

14.en: Then by the power vested in me by EvenYouCanPerformWeddings.Com, I now pronounce you husband and wife. You may kiss the bride.
14.cn: 我以"连你都能证婚网"所赋予我的合法权利，我现在宣布你们正式结为合法夫妻。你可以吻新娘了。

15.en: Yeah, I hate wedding receptions. Yeah, I wish the bride and groom would take a cue from Bilbo Baggins. Slip on the ring, disappear, and everyone goes home.
15.cn: 我最讨厌去婚宴了，真希望新郎新娘能学学比尔博·巴金斯，戴上戒指，隐身，大家就各回各家。

16.en: You know, historically, the best man's role was to defend the bride and groom in combat. I mean, if that's not Penny, I don't know what we're doing here.
16.cn: 你知道，在历史上，伴郎的任务就是在战斗中保护新娘新郎。如果这不选佩妮来做，那我们根本就是在搞笑啊。

17.en: You know what, you're not just insulting me. Okay? You're insulting my family, my culture and my future bride, Anu, a vegetarian with a master's degree from Cornell whose favorite fruit is pineapple.
17.cn: 知道吗，你不仅羞辱了我。你还羞辱了我的家人，我的文化和我未来的新娘安努，她是毕业于康奈尔大学的硕士她吃素最爱的水果是菠萝。

18.en: No, of course. Everybody? I just wanted to say on behalf of my new bride, Rachel, and myself that if in 35 years, we're half as happy as you guys are, we'll count ourselves the luckiest people in the world.
18.cn: 当然不是，大伙们，我只是想代表我的新娘瑞秋跟我自己说，如果我们结婚35年后，有你们一半幸福，我们会觉得自己是全世界最幸运的人。

19.en: Well then, why don't we see the bride and the groom and the bridesmaids? Okay.
19.cn: 我们为什么不让新郎跟伴娘们合照一些照片？好的。
